SEARCH
Package net.tnemc.core.account.holdings

Interface HoldingsHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
EnderChestHandler, ExperienceHandler, ExperienceLevelHandler, InventoryHandler, VirtualHandler
public interface HoldingsHandler
HoldingsHandler represents a handler that could provide additional holding types.
Since:
0.1.2.0
Author:
creatorfromhell
See Also:

  • CurrencyType

  • Method Details

    • identifier

      Identifier identifier()
      The identifier for this handler.
      Returns:
      The identifier that represents this handler.

    • supports

      boolean supports(Currency currency, CurrencyType type)
      Used to determine if this handler may be used for the specifiedCurrency and CurrencyType.
      Parameters:
      currency - The currency.
      type - The currency type.
      Returns:
      True if it supports the currency type, otherwise false.

    • appliesTo

      default boolean appliesTo(Account account, Currency currency)
      Used to determine if this handler may be used for the specified Account. This defaults to true for all accounts.
      Parameters:
      account - The account.
      currency - The currency.
      Returns:
      True if it supports the account, otherwise false.

    • database

      default boolean database()
      Returns:
      If balances of this handler should be saved to the database. Return false to do your own data handling.

    • setHoldings

      boolean setHoldings(Account account, String region, Currency currency, CurrencyType type, BigDecimal amount)
      Used to set the holdings for a specific account.
      Parameters:
      account - The account.
      region - The name of the region involved. This is usually a world, but could be something else such as a world guard region name/identifier.
      currency - The instance of the currency to use.
      type - The currency type.
      amount - The amount to set the player's holdings to.
      Returns:
      True if the holdings have been set, otherwise false.

    • getHoldings

      HoldingsEntry getHoldings(Account account, String region, Currency currency, CurrencyType type)
      Used to get the holdings for a specific account from this handler.
      Parameters:
      account - The Account.
      region - The name of the region involved. This is usually a world, but could be something else such as a world guard region name/identifier.
      currency - The instance of the currency to use.
      type - The currency type.
      Returns:
      The holdings for the specific account.

TheNewEconomy, 2025
